desc: Provides detailed contact-level buyer intent data
Provides aggregated intent data for individual contacts to supply an account-level view of intent
Ability to connect offline databases to collect information that can be matched to online devices
Ability to easily search for and filter technology product reviews depending on requirements.
Allows users to submit new technology reviews, as well as edit exisiting reviews.
Provides valuable company and/or product descriptions alongside reviews.
Provides research reports on technology software categories.
Provides an in depth category taxonomy that compares like-products in a clear way.
Provides a forum for customers to give feedback and data storage for company analysis.
Allows users to get real-time information on competitors performance and reputation.
Gives users greater visibility into the how feel and respond to reputation gaining tactics.
Provides tools with enhanced filtering and correlation between revenue and reputation.
Helps monitor the overall performance of marketing efforts and brand establishment.
Provides a centralized hub and management tools for all data points related to online reputation.
Helps track and monitor social media trends and interactions.
Helps manage social messaging and measures the full impact of social campaigns.
Helps manage ad messaging and measures the full impact of digital advertising campaigns.

Ability for the product to integrate with software to view and utilize contact and account buyer intent data (i.e. CRM software, marketing automation software, account- based marketing software, etc.)
Provides the ability to customize the relevant topics that are tracked
Provides natural language processing (NLP) to identify topics within content (i.e. number of people researching a topic from a business)
Provides buyer intent alerts that can be delivered in a variety of formats (i.e. email, text message, etc.)
Ability to provide a dashboard showcasing intent that streams in real-time (as opposed to bulk deliveries)
Gives visibility into employee performance and each individual's impact on reputation initiatives.
Helps establish a workflow that allows team members to communicate effectively and collaboratively.
Allows users to generate text based on a text prompt.
